title: The Goddess and the moon man
creator_credit: Sandra Holmes, Morning Star Productions and Cecil Holmes
brief_description: A myth about Pukamani, a mortuary ceremony of the Tiwi people of Melville Island, Northern Australia. Dramatically told through the use of the authentic Pukamani grave posts, sculptures and artefacts, fashioned long ago by Tiwi elders for the ceremony.
creator_credit_for_label: Sandra Holmes, Morning Star Productions and Cecil Holmes
